properties.title: Modern Luxury Villa
properties.description: Stunning modern villa with open plan living space and garden
properties.longDescription: This exceptional modern villa offers luxurious living with high-end finishes throughout. Features include a designer kitchen, spacious master suite, home office, and landscaped gardens. Perfect for modern family living with excellent local schools nearby.

properties.title: City Centre Apartment
properties.longDescription: Luxurious city centre apartment featuring floor-to-ceiling windows, modern appliances, and stunning city views. Includes secure parking, 24-hour concierge, and resident's gym. Walking distance to transport links and local amenities.

properties.title: Victorian Family Home
properties.description: Beautifully restored Victorian property with period features
properties.longDescription: Magnificent Victorian family home retaining original features including fireplaces, cornicing, and stained glass windows. Modernized kitchen and bathrooms, plus a converted loft space. South-facing garden with mature plants and a garden office.

properties.title: Waterfront Studio
properties.description: Modern studio apartment with river views
properties.longDescription: Stylish studio apartment in a prestigious waterfront development. Features include integrated appliances, floor-to-ceiling windows, and a private balcony overlooking the river. Excellent transport links and amenities nearby.

properties.title: Converted Warehouse
properties.description: Industrial-style loft apartment in converted warehouse
properties.longDescription: Stunning warehouse conversion featuring exposed brick walls, original beams, and double-height ceilings. Open-plan living space with mezzanine level, designer kitchen, and large windows. Includes secure parking and communal roof terrace.

properties.title: Garden Cottage
properties.longDescription: Delightful cottage offering character and charm with modern comforts. Features include inglenook fireplace, country-style kitchen, and established garden with fruit trees. Peaceful location with easy access to local amenities.

properties.title: Penthouse Suite
properties.description: Luxury penthouse with panoramic city views
properties.longDescription: Exceptional penthouse apartment offering luxury living at its finest. Features include wraparound terrace, high-spec kitchen, home automation system, and private lift access. Premium location with concierge service and secure parking.
